title: Save 82% off this Dog Training Course
content:

The International Open Academy course is taught by an experienced dog trainer, Ian Stone. You will work on various leash walking techniques, using food to assist certain training, as well as heel-sits. You’ll also teach your dog how to socialise in a well-behaved manner so that when out on walks your dog is calm and friendly around strangers. This course will suit anyone that owns a dog or is thinking about buying/rescuing a dog, and would also benefit anyone who works with dogs, such as dog walkers or rescue centre staff.
